CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
CurrentVersion.description: Search now returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders. Note: We have updated the release phase to show the current state.  We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Folder/Subfolder Recursive Search
OldVersion.description: Search returns content stored in the main folder and content stored within all its sub-folders.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Schedule a Viva Pulse request to be resent
CurrentVersion.description: Schedule and resend pulses to get periodic feedback from your team members.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Schedule a Viva Pulse request to be resent
OldVersion.description:
Schedule and resend pulses to get periodic
feedback from your team members.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Collaborative Notes in Channel Meetings
OldVersion.description: Collaborative Notes will replace Wiki-based Channel Meeting Notes. Collaborative Notes in channel meetings allow attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative Notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in. Assigned Tasks in Collaborative Notes automatically sync with To Do and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Last used date inside Tenant Allow Block List
OldVersion.description: Tenant allow block list domains & addresses, URL, and file entries will show last used date. This helps admins understand when an entry was last used (either at mailflow or time of click), helping them remove entries which are no longer needed.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings). Note: We have updated the Release Phase to show the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Copilot in Stream
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Stream leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to help you quickly get the insights you need from Stream (on SharePoint) videos. With Copilot in Stream you can quickly and effectively summarize any video with a transcript, or ask deep dive questions for topics you need to understand. This feature is only available for customers who have purchased the Microsoft 365 Copilot license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
OldVersion.description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Junk/Phishing reporting actions integrated with Microsoft Defender in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in classic Outlook for Windows can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Outlook for Mac - Junk/Phishing Reporting Actions Integrated with Microsoft Defender
CurrentVersion.description: The appearance and behavior of Report Phishing/Report Junk actions in Outlook for Mac can be controlled by admins using User Reported Settings in security.microsoft.com. Admins will be able to control whether these Report actions appear in Outlook, where these messages get reported to, and whether the user is prompted when they report phishing or junk. Admins will also be able to customize text and other aspects of the dialogs that appear before and after users' report phishing or junk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
OldVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections for Frontline workers
CurrentVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
OldVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Sticky Note Visual Refresh
CurrentVersion.description: This updates the visuals of the sticky note feature in Whiteboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Reactions in Town halls (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Participants can use reactions (like, love, applause, laugh, surprised) to express themselves during a town hall and the reactions appear as a continuous stream on the side of the screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Share to Teams will be added to the ribbon in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now be able to find a "Share to Teams" button in the ribbon whenever they select an email in the reading pane. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections news notifications on desktop
CurrentVersion.description: With this release, existing news notifications in Viva Connections mobile will also be available in Viva Connections desktop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search - UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live Share support for Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tab applications
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams applications that use Live Share for building real-time collaborative experiences – previously limited to Meeting Stage and Side Panel tabs – will be able to extend to Chat, Channel, and Collaborative Stageview tabs on desktop and web. Live Share enables collaborative features such as co-watching, co-creating, and co-editing content in real time. All applications enabled in your tenant using the existing Live Share permission will be eligible for this feature.
